name: NssmManage
description: Install and edit windows service through nssm.
author: cnatan
helpMarkDown: Install and edit windows service through nssm.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when nssm is run.

inputs.name: nssmpath
inputs.label: Nssm executable path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Nssm executable path if not in PATH variable.

inputs.name: apppath
inputs.label: Application path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application or script to be runned as service.

inputs.name: startupdir
inputs.label: Startup directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Startup directory of the windows service. Default is the ApplicationPath directory.

inputs.name: appargs
inputs.label: Application Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments to be passed to application runned as service.

inputs.name: serviceaccount
inputs.label: Service LogOn Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: The windows service account to run the service. Default is system account.

inputs.name: outfile
inputs.label: I/O stdout file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of file to redirect application stdout.

inputs.name: errfile
inputs.label: I/O stderr file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of file to redirect application stderr.

inputs.name: rotate
inputs.label: Rotate stdout/stderr files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether rotate log file generated from stdout/stderr redirect.

inputs.name: rotaterunning
inputs.label: Rotate files while running
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether rotate log file while service is running. Default is only on service start.

inputs.name: rotateperseconds
inputs.label: Rotate files older than X seconds
inputs.helpMarkDown: Restrict rotation to files older than X seconds.

inputs.name: rotateperbytes
inputs.label: Rotate files bigger than X bytes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Restrict rotation to files bigger than X bytes.
